name: Super Frog's Quest
description: Classic 2D platforming action with a delicious twist! Travel through nine different levels, each with their own unique challenge and style. Gobble up your enemies and use their own abilities against them. Fight your way to the alien menace and rescue the tadpoles in Super Frog's Quest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.x, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 200 Mhz pentium processor or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
